dominio.pcapDumper
Class OfflineSavePacketHandler

java.lang.Object
  dominio.pcapDumper.OfflineSavePacketHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
jpcap.PacketReceiver
public class OfflineSavePacketHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements jpcap.PacketReceiver

Handler que recoge los paquetes ne modo offline y los almacena en el fichero .

Version:
2.0
Author:
Leonardo Garca & JoseRamn Gutierrez
See Also:
Captura, SaveFileName, SaveTime, SaveSpace, CountPacketHandler, PacketReceiver, JpcapCaptor, JpcapWriter
